name: Skipping Frog
description:
Simple and fun game. The goal is to make the frog get to the other side of the pond without wasting your lives in the least time and with the highest score.
Follow the direction of the leaves by swiping on the direction (only available on IOS 5.0 and above) or pressing the corresponding control (all versions).
Two levels: easy and hard; on the hard level, controls get switched randomly for extra challenge!.
Any feedback is appreciated, so please follow us on twitter (@drcoderz),
visit us on www.drcoderz.com or find us in facebook and submit feedback or ideas to improve it. Thanks and have fun!!

Options:
-Easy and Hard levels
-Save your current game data for continuing later
-Pause / Continue game at any time
-Submit to leaderboards
